column4: afternoon all i have a quick question if someone has an answer. i need to delete a file located in .mozilla/firefox/j6cd7xgt.default called "lock" but i can not figure out how. any help?
i tried that and it says no such file or dir. even though i can navigate to it
Just to make sure, you do know his will delete all the settings in the default profile for firefox?
i read it will only unlock it so i can use default again
i cant sign on because it says that default is in use
i will try that and brb thanks
i need to get my default user back for all my fav's passwords etc. and i read that deleting that will unlock firefox so that i can sign back in under default
thanks that did it i really appreciate your help
firefox works under default again and all my stuffis there
It's the least I could do :)
